statements: SELECT * FROM artwork_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, artwork_id, buyer_id, seller_id, price FROM artwork_transactions WHERE seller_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, artwork_id, buyer_id, seller_id, price, transaction_date FROM artwork_transactions WHERE buyer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, artwork_id, price FROM artwork_transactions WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM artwork_transactions GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM artwork_transactions WHERE buyer_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT seller_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM artwork_transactions GROUP BY seller_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT seller_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM artwork_transactions WHERE price > 500 GROUP BY seller_id;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM artwork_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_id, seller_id, price, transaction_date FROM artwork_transactions WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE price > 500;
SELECT artwork_id, title, medium, price FROM artwork WHERE artist_id = 10 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id;
SELECT transaction_id, artwork_id, buyer_id, seller_id, price FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT artwork_id, title, price FROM artwork WHERE artist_id = 101 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;

SELECT artwork.title, artwork.medium, transactions.price FROM artwork JOIN transactions ON artwork.artwork_id = transactions.artwork_id WHERE transactions.buyer_id = 201 AND transactions.seller_id = 301;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT artist_id, COUNT(artwork_id) AS num_artworks FROM artwork GROUP BY artist_id HAVING num_artworks > 3 ORDER BY num_artworks DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT artwork_id, title, price FROM artwork WHERE artist='Vincent van Gogh';
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_records GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id;
SELECT * FROM artwork WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, token_amount FROM token_balance WHERE token_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT artwork_id,title,price FROM artwork WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT buyer_id,seller_id,transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE buyer_id = 1001 AND seller_id = 2002;
SELECT artwork_id,title,price,created_at FROM artwork WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT wallet_address,token_amount FROM token_balance ORDER BY token_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, artwork_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_records;
SELECT title, description, creation_date FROM artwork;
SELECT artist_id, bio, country, website FROM artist;
SELECT token_id, artwork_id, token_owner, token_status FROM token;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM transaction_records GROUP BY buyer_id, seller_id;
SELECT artist.name, artwork.title, artwork.description FROM artist JOIN artwork ON artist.artist_id = artwork.artist_id WHERE artist.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE price > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT artist.name, COUNT(artwork.title) AS total_artworks FROM artist JOIN artwork ON artist.artist_id = artwork.artist_id GROUP BY artist.name ORDER BY total_artworks DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT artwork_id, price FROM transactions WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT buyer_name, email FROM buyers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM artwork ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, bio FROM artists WHERE website IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artwork_id, title, price FROM artwork WHERE price > 1000 AND token_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, bio, website FROM artists WHERE bio ILIKE '%painter%' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT buyer_name, email, address FROM buyers WHERE address ILIKE '%New York%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT seller_name, email, address FROM sellers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY seller_name DESC;
